predicate.note: Frames file for 'recite' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 26.7-1 and 37.1.

example.name: pretty basic
example.text: Besides *trace* reciting the pardon for program trading contained in the Brady Commission report, they said stock-index arbitrage was actually needed Monday to restore the markets' equilibrium.
example.arg: the pardon for program trading contained in the Brady Commission report
